com.cloudera.oryx.app.rdf.decision

Class NumericDecision

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.app.rdf.decision.Decision
      • com.cloudera.oryx.app.rdf.decision.NumericDecision
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class NumericDecision
extends Decision
    Represents a decision over a numeric feature. Decisions are defined simply by a threshold value; the decision is positive if the feature's value is greater than or equal to this decision's threshold value.
    See Also:
    CategoricalDecision, Serialized Form
